@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?>
+<?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?>
+<?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?>
+<?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?>
+<?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
+<?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
+
+<BorderPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/15.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="rps.gui.controller.StartController">
+   <center>
+      <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="412.0" prefWidth="623.0" spacing="5.0" styleClass="bodybg" stylesheets="@../CSS/StartBG.css">
+         <children>
+            <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="100.0" prefWidth="200.0" spacing="15.0">
+               <children>
+                  <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Enter Name:" />
+                  <TextField maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="25.0" prefWidth="201.0" />
+                  <Button mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#startGame" text="Start" />
+               </children>
+            </HBox>
+         </children>
+      </VBox>
+   </center>
+   <top>
+      <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Rock-Paper-Scissors" textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="237.3453369140625" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER" />
+   </top>
+</BorderPane>
